pages.text: Forged in the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() using soul-touched components and a totem of undying. This reagent captures the essence of liberation from mortal bonds.

A reagent infused with the essence of liberation and soul manipulation. This catalyst can be combined with a $(item)Demon Slate$() in an Alchemy Array to create the $(l:animus:sigils/sigil_free_soul)Sigil of the Free Soul$().

pages.title: Soul Liberation
pages.text: Not all bindings are meant to be permanent. This reagent channels the power to release souls from their containers, freeing trapped essences to return to the cycle. A merciful power in the hands of practitioners who understand the sanctity of the soul.
